```{r}
library(shiny)
ui <- navbarPage(
  "NYC Restaurant",
  tabPanel(
    "Static Plots",
    sidebarLayout(
      sidebarPanel(
        selectInput(inputId = "borough",
                    label = "Choose a borough:",
                    choices = c("Manhattan", "Brooklyn",
                                "Staten Island", "Queens",
                                "Bronx"))
      ),
      mainPanel(
        plotOutput(outputId = "plot")
      )
    )
  )
)
server <- function(input, output) {
  borough_data <- reactive({
    if ( "Manhattan" %in% input$borough){
      data = data %>% filter(data$BORO=='Manhattan')
      return(data)
    }
    if ( "Brooklyn" %in% input$borough){
      data = data %>% filter(data$BORO=='Brooklyn')
      return(data)
    }
    if ( "Staten Island" %in% input$borough){
      data = data %>% filter(data$BORO=='Staten Island')
      return(data)
    }
    if ( "Queens" %in% input$borough){
      data = data %>% filter(data$BORO=='Queens')
      return(data)
    }
    if ( "Bronx" %in% input$borough){
      data = data %>% filter(data$BORO=='Bronx')
      return(data)
    }
  })
  output$plot=renderPlot({
    data = borough_data()
    ggplot(data, aes(x = factor(GRADE)))+  
         geom_bar(width = 0.9) + coord_flip() +
         scale_x_discrete(labels = function(x) str_wrap(x, width = 200))
    })
}
shinyApp(ui = ui, server = server)
```
